parse.title: Lists of universities and colleges by country

text.*:
This is a list of lists of universities and colleges by country, sorted by continent and region. The lists represent educational institutions throughout the world which provide higher education in tertiary, quaternary, and post-secondary education.

Contents

  • 1 By continent
    • 1.1 Africa
      • 1.1.1 Central Africa
      • 1.1.2 East Africa
      • 1.1.3 Horn of Africa
      • 1.1.4 Northern Africa
      • 1.1.5 Southern Africa
      • 1.1.6 Southeastern Africa
      • 1.1.7 Western Africa
    • 1.2 Americas
      • 1.2.1 Caribbean
      • 1.2.2 Central America
      • 1.2.3 North America
      • 1.2.4 South America
    • 1.3 Asia
      • 1.3.1 Central Asia
      • 1.3.2 Eastern Asia
      • 1.3.3 Southeastern Asia
      • 1.3.4 South Asia
      • 1.3.5 Western Asia
    • 1.4 Europe
      • 1.4.1 Eastern Europe
      • 1.4.2 Northern Europe
      • 1.4.3 Southern Europe
      • 1.4.4 Western Europe
    • 1.5 Oceania
      • 1.5.1 Australia
      • 1.5.2 Melanesia
      • 1.5.3 Micronesia
      • 1.5.4 Polynesia
  • 2 By region
    • 2.1 The Arab world
  • 3 International
  • 4 See also
  • 5 External links
